strapiPost.title: NWA Council Encourages Residents To Vote
strapiPost.content:
As residents of Northwest Arkansas, we are a part of what it is and what it becomes, and we can actively shape that now by making our voices heard in the May primaries.

  • Making a community: The Northwest Arkansas Council said it best: “Participating in the democratic process is perhaps the most important thing we can do to make the region, state, and country more inclusive and equitable.” The council has also provided a guide that will walk you through the process of voting and how to stay informed. 
  • Set up: Early voting for the primary elections starts Monday, May 9. Before then, you can go here to make sure your voter registration is in good standing considering the recent census changes.

Learn more HERE.
